Name: Tanvi
Title: Not well maintained
Review: As it is a historical place was very much excited to visit here . But when I visited here all my excitement was finished . This bagh is  not well maintained and not clean also .

Name: durham05
Title: Small
Review: This is an ok park but not huge and won't take long to look round. Place associated with 1857 battle of Lucknow.

Name: Harsh V
Title: not so good
Review: i was specially visit sikandar bagh to see the beautiy but my mood is spamed when we visit the place the place is closed i am so angry and there no proper timing instructions very bad managment

Name: baburammarch25
Title: Signifies the great landmark of India's first war of Independence.
Review: This great historical landmark is not as much maintained as it should be, give the great historical significance that it stands for. The garden area is well maintained. However, work can be done to restore glory of the architecture.

Name: Aarav K
Title: Sikandar Bagh
Review: This is a historical place. Not well maintained. If you are a history lover, you should definitely check it once. There is nothing special for everyone else.

Name: Rajani B
Title: Park within Botanical Research Institute
Review: This is a park within the National Botanical Institute which was built in the year 1800. The park was named after the queen of Wajid Ali Shah , who was the last ruler of Awadh.  The historical importance of this place is that it was the site of India's first war of Independence.  The garden is a beautiful and well maintained one.

Name: chetan1586
Title: Decent Attraction !!
Review: Sikandar bagh is not a very well known tourist destination & can be covered if you have some time during the day.

Name: Atif M
Title: historical monument
Review: historical monument, with lot of green space, but badly kept. good for history lovers.in the middle of the city.

Name: manoj k
Title: small place  need to go to see it  specially
Review: this is small place, you   need to go to see it  specially rather can be seen while passing though the road next to it.

Name: Rudrapratap R
Title: nothing very special
Review: Shikandar bagh made by saadat ali khan , nawab of awadh.Not very popular, near by of Hazrat ganj. and gomti rever.

Name: ApurbaRoy
Title: place
Review: A place of interest from Mughal period. Quiet and calm place amid busy city area near hazarat ganj. One can appreciate the old building and structure here

Name: ameoba88
Title: Should not be an option of TripAdvisor
Review: Seriously, no joke. The only reason this is up here on TripAdvisor is because it's a protected site by the Architectural Society of India. Wouldn't take you even 5 minutes to visit - and you'd hardly be adding any value in those 5 minutes either.It is a smallish park basically - with a few benches around. A good place to sit and have a conversation perhaps, but it's located at a major intersection so pretty noisy. There is a largish arched doorway - inside of which construction is stored. There's a small masjid which you can't enter unless you're a muslim - not stand out from an architectural PoV anyways. Annd that's about it.

Name: KGB777
Title: A small garden with a renovated gateway
Review: Worth a quick stop to soak up the atmosphere of old Lucknow. Some peace and tranquillity near a major intersection.

Name: Deepak P
Title: nooooooooo
Review: its awasome place to roaming but toooo.... noisy............
